q: "For the last 10 years, we have all been equally involved in making decisions," Eric Schmidt said in a post on the Blog" target="_blank"> Google blog. This triumvirate approach has real benefits in terms of shared wisdom, and we will continue to discuss the big decisions among the three of us, he said. "But we have also agreed to clarify our individual roles so there's clear responsibility and accountability at the top of the company."
